channel.title: Question about Mods
channel.description:
Hey everyone.
I plan to install TF2 for the sake of Black Mesa. However, seeing as how BM works with TF2, I'd like to know if any other HL-Based mods are compatible with it, or will there be missing textures or models seeing as how I do not own HL2 or any of the episodes?
Thank you all, -Zero

item.title: Question about Mods
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Specifically, the “Source SDK Base 2007” tool. Make sure it says “Base” and “2007”.

And now, with that question answered, locked.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about Mods
item.dc:creator: ZCOverload
item.description:
Great to hear. I happen to be getting a replacement computer being sent to me in a week, so it’s perfect timing for BM’s release.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about Mods
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
As long as you have Source SDK Base downloaded, everything will work fine.

Read full topic
